verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> again to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H5057>prince<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyrus,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H1361>lifted<s%> up, and you have <S%H559>said,<s%> I am a <S%H410>God,<s%> I <S%H3427>sit<s%> in the <S%H4186>seat<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> in the <S%H3820>middle<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas;<s%> yet you are a <S%H120>man,<s%> and not <S%H410>God,<s%> though you <S%H5414>set<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> as the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H430>God:<s%>
<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> you are <S%H2450>wiser<s%> than <S%H1840>Daniel;<s%> there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5640>secret<s%> that they can <S%H6004>hide<s%> from you:

With your <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and with your <S%H8394>understanding<s%> you have <S%H6213>gotten<s%> you <S%H2428>riches,<s%> and have <S%H6213>gotten<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%> into your <S%H214>treasures:<s%>

By your <S%H7230>great<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and by your <S%H7404>traffic<s%> have you <S%H7235>increased<s%> your <S%H2428>riches,<s%> and your <S%H3824>heart<s%> is <S%H1361>lifted<s%> up because of your <S%H2428>riches:<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> you have <S%H5414>set<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> as the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%> on you, the <S%H6184>terrible<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations:<s%> and they shall <S%H7324>draw<s%> their <S%H2719>swords<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3308>beauty<s%> of your <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and they shall <S%H2490>defile<s%> your <S%H3314>brightness.<s%>

They shall <S%H3381>bring<s%> you <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7845>pit,<s%> and you shall <S%H4191>die<s%> the <S%H4463>deaths<s%> of them that are <S%H2491>slain<s%> in the <S%H3820>middle<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas.<s%>

Will you <S%H559>yet<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him that <S%H2026>slays<s%> you, I am <S%H430>God?<s%> but you shall be a <S%H120>man,<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of him that <S%H2490>slays<s%> you.

You shall <S%H4191>die<s%> the <S%H4194>deaths<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H2114>strangers:<s%> for I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5375>take<s%> up a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> on the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyrus,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to him, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> You <S%H2856>seal<s%> up the <S%H8508>sum,<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and <S%H3632>perfect<s%> in <S%H3308>beauty.<s%>

You have <S%H1961>been<s%> in <S%H5731>Eden<s%> the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> was your <S%H4540>covering,<s%> the <S%H124>sardius,<s%> <S%H6357>topaz,<s%> and the <S%H3095>diamond,<s%> the <S%H8658>beryl,<s%> the <S%H7718>onyx,<s%> and the <S%H3471>jasper,<s%> the <S%H5601>sapphire,<s%> the <S%H5306>emerald,<s%> and the <S%H1304>carbuncle,<s%> and <S%H2091>gold:<s%> the <S%H4399>workmanship<s%> of your <S%H8596>tabrets<s%> and of your <S%H5345>pipes<s%> was <S%H3559>prepared<s%> in you in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that you were <S%H1254>created.<s%>

You are the <S%H4473>anointed<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> that <S%H5526>covers;<s%> and I have <S%H5414>set<s%> you so: you <S%H1961>were<s%> on the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%> you have <S%H1980>walked<s%> up and down in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H784>fire.<s%>
You were <S%H8549>perfect<s%> in your <S%H1870>ways<s%> from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that you were <S%H1254>created,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> was <S%H4672>found<s%> in you.

By the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H7404>merchandise<s%> they have <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of you with <S%H2555>violence,<s%> and you have <S%H2398>sinned:<s%> therefore I will <S%H2490>cast<s%> you as <S%H2490>profane<s%> out of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H430>God:<s%> and I will <S%H6>destroy<s%> you, O <S%H5526>covering<s%> <S%H3742>cherub,<s%> from the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H784>fire.<s%>

Your <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H1361>lifted<s%> up because of your <S%H3308>beauty,<s%> you have <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> your <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> by <S%H5921>reason<s%> of your <S%H3314>brightness:<s%> I will <S%H7993>cast<s%> you to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> you <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4428>kings,<s%> that they may <S%H7200>behold<s%> you.

You have <S%H2490>defiled<s%> your <S%H4720>sanctuaries<s%> by the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H5771>iniquities,<s%> by the <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> of your <S%H7404>traffic;<s%> therefore will I <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> from the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of you, it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> you, and I will <S%H5414>bring<s%> you to <S%H665>ashes<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> them that <S%H7200>behold<s%> you.

<S%H3605>All<s%> they that <S%H3045>know<s%> you among the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be <S%H8074>astonished<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> you: you shall be a <S%H1091>terror,<s%> and <S%H5704>never<s%> <S%H5769><s%> shall you be any more.
Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H6721>Zidon,<s%> and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it,

And <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I am <S%H5921>against<s%> you, O <S%H6721>Zidon;<s%> and I will be <S%H3513>glorified<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of you: and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when I shall have <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> in her, and shall be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in her.

For I will <S%H7971>send<s%> into her <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> and <S%H1818>blood<s%> into her <S%H2351>streets;<s%> and the <S%H2491>wounded<s%> shall be <S%H5307>judged<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of her by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> on her on <S%H5437>every<s%> <S%H5439>side;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And there shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> a <S%H3992>pricking<s%> <S%H5544>brier<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> nor any <S%H3510>grieving<s%> <S%H6975>thorn<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that are <S%H5439>round<s%> about them, that <S%H7590>despised<s%> them; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> When I shall have <S%H6908>gathered<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H5971>people<s%> among <S%H834>whom<s%> they are <S%H6327>scattered,<s%> and shall be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in them in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> then shall they <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in their <S%H127>land<s%> that I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

And they shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely<s%> <S%H5921>therein,<s%> and shall <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards;<s%> yes, they shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with <S%H983>confidence,<s%> when I have <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> those that <S%H7590>despise<s%> them <S%H5439>round<s%> about them; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>
